# Mount Allen (Stewart Island)

Mount Allen is the second-highest peak on Stewart Island in southern New Zealand. Located in the southwest of the island, it lies  from the coast at Port Pegasus. Mount Allen rises to a height of  and is the highest point in a short range of hills known as Tin Range. It is part of the Rakiura National Park.
